text: Entente Feignies Aulnoye Football Club is a French association football team. It was founded in 1951 as Sporting Club de Feignies and is based in Feignies, France. It currently plays in the Championnat National 3, the fifth tier in the French football league system. It plays matches at the Stade Léo Lagrange in Feignies. Feignies had a run of promotions in the first decade of the 21st century. As recently as 1999, they were playing in regional divisions at the ninth tier of French football, rising to the fourth tier of the French leagues, the Championnat de France Amateurs in 2005, where they played one season. In the summer of 2016 SC Feignies merged with neighbouring side AS Aulnoye-Aymeries, who were relegated from CFA 2 at the end of the 2015–16 season, to form the current club. ==References== == External links == * Official Site of SC Feignies (last updated January 2016) * Official Site of AS Aulnoye, now official site of Entente Feignies Aulnoye FC Category:Football clubs in France Category:Association football clubs established in 1951 Category:1951 establishments in France
title: Feignies Aulnoye FC
